titleStmt.title: The dying young man, and the obdurate maid, or, A strange and wonderful relation of a young man that dyed for love ... with the maids perplexity for loss of her love, and how likely she is to dy [sic] for the same cause ... To the tune of, Fancies phenix.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Right half sheet contains: The second part, to the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow Library.
